name: Final Entropy (Unthreaded)
description:
Final Entropy: Compat Mode

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire Weapons
  • Space Bar - Dash w/ iFrames
  • Escape - Pause + Options Menu

If you find this version of Final Entropy runs slowly/choppy, you can try a Threaded version of the game here: Final Entropy (Threaded Mode)

Not all machines/browsers are compatible, but it will be a more performant version of the game!
